body.p:
Three options are available for payment processing:
Credit Card
eCheck
Offline Payment Payments can be saved in the Community Portal to provide users with an expedited checkout for future purchases.
To use a credit card, follow the steps below. If you have a credit card stored with your profile the information will automatically display.

ul.li: Select the Credit Card tab. If you are an existing user, you may have stored card card information.

To use the stored credit card select Saved Method.
Click Pay to pay for and complete your purchase.

Select New Payment Method to add a new card.
Enter the credit card number, expiration month, expiration year, CVV number, and card holder's name.
Select Save to retain your payment information for future use.
Click Pay to pay for and complete your purchase.

body.p: To process payment via electronic bank debit follow the steps below:

ul.li: Enter the name of the account holder.
Provide the name of the bank.
Click Bank Account Type and select the account to use for payment, Checking or Savings.
Click Bank Account Holder Type and select the type of account to be used, Personal or Business.
Select Save to retain your payment information for future use.
Click Pay to pay for and complete your purchase.

body.p: To enter an offline payment, follow the steps below.

ul.li: Enter the check number into the Check field.
Click the Pay with Check button.

li.p: After your payment is received the Confirmation Page will display.
